text:
Is it possible to reverse-proxy more than one site under one hostname?

For example:
<http://example.com/site1|example.com/site1> -> HubSpot-site1
<http://example.com/site2|example.com/site2> -> HubSpot-site2

A corporation wants to bring their HubSpots under one hostname.
I have followed <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/reverse-proxy-support#configure-the-proxy|the instructions> but got stuck at point 9
because there are assets with absolute paths unique to a particular HubSpot site,
and the reverse proxy is unable to decide which one to send the requests to.
In addition, there might be a risk of other resources clashing like cookies, etc.
